body:
doc-string is dict or list of dicts, so what you are doing is not supported. what you *could* do is check for ``is_dict_like`` and if not do ``dict(obj)``. This function is not in any way aware of Series. (as you would normally NOT have embedded Series *inside* a dataframe, just lists and dicts. You would have to work very hard to get it there in the first place.

If you want to push a PR to fix, ok

```
Signature: json_normalize(data, record_path=None, meta=None, meta_prefix=None, record_prefix=None, errors='raise', sep='.')
Docstring:
"Normalize" semi-structured JSON data into a flat table

Parameters
----------
data : dict or list of dicts
    Unserialized JSON objects
```
